text: “Gu kaŋgi, nde fhum gumgi mbari ga sarigi, mbe Zon han ŋgɨp ana buni ndirga. Zon bun suaŋgi buni, nta guigira buni guari ma. Gu nduara kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, harigi guma the buneŋ na buneŋ havhargirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Gu vuzvugi, Fhe Bakɨme taagip nde ndirga. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde Zon suaŋgi buni, nde nta ndɨkndɨgɨri. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, Zon bun suaŋgi buni, nta guigira buni guari ma.
